title: Italian Pasta Making
description: Learn to make authentic Italian pasta from scratch. I'll teach you traditional techniques passed down through generations, including how to make perfect dough and various pasta shapes.

title: Python Programming for Beginners
description: Complete introduction to Python programming. Perfect for absolute beginners who want to learn their first programming language. We'll cover basics to building simple projects.

title: Acoustic Guitar Lessons
description: Learn acoustic guitar from basic chords to fingerpicking techniques. Suitable for all levels, from complete beginners to intermediate players looking to improve.

title: Conversational Spanish
description: Improve your Spanish speaking skills through casual conversation practice. Focus on everyday situations, travel phrases, and building confidence in speaking.

title: Beginner Yoga Classes
description: Gentle introduction to yoga focusing on basic poses, breathing techniques, and mindfulness. Perfect for those new to yoga or looking to establish a regular practice.

title: Digital Photography Basics
description: Want to learn the fundamentals of digital photography. Interested in composition, lighting, and basic photo editing techniques.

title: French Language Practice
description: Looking to practice conversational French. I have basic knowledge but need help with pronunciation and building vocabulary for travel.

title: Bread Baking Workshop
description: Learn the art of bread making from sourdough starters to perfect kneading techniques. We'll make various types of bread including sourdough, whole wheat, and artisan loaves.

title: Web Design Fundamentals
description: Interested in learning modern web design principles, HTML/CSS basics, and creating responsive websites. Complete beginner looking for patient instruction.

title: Piano Lessons
description: Always wanted to learn piano! Looking for someone to teach me basic techniques, reading music, and playing simple songs. Have a keyboard at home.
